projects: [{"title":"Comparative Study of Graph Algorithms - Algorithms I - Course Project","start_date":"Mar 2022","end_date":"Apr 2022","description":"Compared the different graph algorithms to find the shortest path to solve problems like cost optimization & fuel minimization Analyzed the performance of Flyod-Warshall, Bellman-Ford and Dijkstraâ€™s algorithms on a set of directed & undirected graphs Presented and discussed the performance of the different algorithms with the course instructor & achieved a grade point of A"},{"title":"Students Welfare Group App - IIT Kharagpur","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"May 2021","description":"Developed an Android App, having a user base of 2000+ so that students can access resources and material of IIT Kharagpur Enhanced the number of install by 10% by building the notice board where students can receive notices about the events Integrated Firebase Cloud Messaging Feature in Android Studio in Java, to send notifications to the users in a specific topic"}]
